title: Ahri, what do you see?
body:
How most people see her

<inappropriate image>

How I see her

http://orig10.deviantart.net/2bb5/f/2014/077/5/3/popstar_ahri_by_tunako-d7ao1x3.jpg

Isn't she sooooooooo cute <3~

http://40.media.tumblr.com/45afcaba1ba3ab76c434c4aa79bc8663/tumblr_n0pznznKRk1tof9kfo4_500.png

replies.body:
How I see her:

http://previews.123rf.com/images/yayayoy/yayayoy1110/yayayoy111000008/10870487-Tombstone-Stock-Vector-tombstone-grave-cartoon.jpg
{{champion:86}} JUSTICE!
JUSTIC!*
https://sp.yimg.com/xj/th?id=OIP.Me849564b6381046b9e1668f3dc0c2876o0&pid=15.1&P=0&w=300&h=300
http://kaufmanfurs.com/gallery/albums/userpics/10001/thumb_02-05-15%20Marc%20Kaufman%20Furs%20Mens%20Men%20Fox%20Fur%20Jacket%20lo%20res-2.jpg
You took lessons from Cruella DeVil, I see.

LeBlanc, truth be told.

https://38.media.tumblr.com/7fdd79c851f5bad074f0fc04de496364/tumblr_inline_n1cbr5bdqG1r85285.png
https://media.giphy.com/media/10jRHyuxV1FsvC/giphy.gif

How I see her:
http://imagizer.imageshack.us/a/img745/4291/5wsSdA.png
EXACTLY!
Why do I love this so much? Formal Ahri is different than what I'm used to.
Because Suqling, the artist, is an amazing human being who deserves your respect.
Ah, I remember Suqling. That explains why that artstyle looked so familiar to me.
Flagged.
what?
I guess because the first picture could be NSFW, but I don't really see that.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ovNOkaUp,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-10-23T23:51:37.938+0000)
>
> I guess because the first picture could be NSFW, but I don't really see that.

I've been moderated for less.

Or more. More clothes I mean.
Look at her stomach. It's... rather... phallic-y.
Pretty sure that you don't know what phallic means...
Just look close enough. Look at the base of her stomach and go up to her chest. You'll see it. Be warned though, what is seen can not be unseen.
If you're talking about her abs, then it's a huge stretch that they look anything like penis. I honestly don't see it.
Turn the picture 90 degrees counter-clockwise (To the left). Look at her breasts, to the bulge that starts between them, then take it up to her stomach.
huge balls tiny shaft but mk
https://images.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=http%3A%2F%2Ffc04.deviantart.net%2Ffs71%2Ff%2F2014%2F274%2F4%2F6%2Ffat_fox_by_3trainerpoke-d817ybi.png&f=1
you had me at boobs

All I see are her fluffy tails.
http://img02.deviantart.net/cd37/i/2014/104/2/3/league_of_legends_ahri_hd_wallpaper_by_ikuehnde-d7e96xi.jpg
So soft...more soft than a pillow of cats.
It's not hard to top a pillow of cats, cats are incredibly uncomfortable (believe me I've tried).
Can confirm, have the scars as proof.

You've got balls

I've gotten 1 week bans for far less.

How I see her;

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6SwiSpudKWI
Yes! SNSD!
Now, if there was a TVXQ! skin. A mirotic skin. I would be super happy.
*_* OMG DON'T EVEN TEMPT ME LIKE THAT. That would be life changing <3 with like... Yoochun's hairstyle. LOL. Jaejoong's beauty....Junsu's voice :3

The funny thing is, I see Ahri as all 3. The first picture matches her lore at the beginning, she was basically seducing people for their life. So it isn't far fetched to see her like that if not even worse. The 2nd really doesn't add much but I just see her more as cute than sexy other than popstar, that one is sexy. The 3rd one is how she is trying to get away from how she was since she is growing a conscious so while she isn't as dimwitted as in the picture. She is trying to be human and not a monster like she was before.

But sadly it all doesn't amount to anything since lore doesn't exist anymore and her ingame quotes don't really say how she wants to be.
Pre-DFG removal is the first picture.  Post DFG: {{item:3711}} (get it?? Cuz it's worthless?)

> [{quoted}](name=Lhostalis,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ovNOkaUp,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-10-24T01:24:23.971+0000)
>
> Pre-DFG removal is the first picture.  Post DFG: {{item:3711}} (get it?? Cuz it's worthless?)

Yeah top tier mid for countless patches. Definitely Urgot tier.
You misspelled Urgod {{champion:6}}
so uh the artist who drew the first ahri pic, does he also do jinx?

Kerasu

Yep.

what do you see?

#ABS.
I mean... Jesus girl, what is your routine?!
Perso i see her like you but i think she should be like all :P
Is it bad that I see her as all 3?
I see her as an axeing bag {{champion:14}}
Anyone else get a giant Sykkuno vibe from the later two?
